body: When I see artists like this having to comply with their censorship laws it really bothers because of how pointless those laws are in the first place, censoring genitals in porn is completely without reason there is NO benefit to speak of whatsoever, I'm baffled they haven't changed those laws yet, as hard as it might be to accept, people mainly watch porn to see genitals bashing together that's where everyone's eyes go when they watch porn, even if it's censored, there are laws you could argue that do more harm than good then there's laws like this that any reasonable man would take a look at and go, ''Well that's a COMPLETE waste of fucking time why is that law even there?'' either ban it outright or let it be in it's entirety this half assed bullshit isn't benefiting anyone
